projects.name: E-commerce website
projects.description: Built with React, Redux, and Sass. Implemented features such as product filtering, sorting, and pagination. Integrated with a backend API to fetch and display product data. Optimized for performance and accessibility.

projects.name: Recipe app
projects.description: Built with React, Firebase, and styled-components. Implemented features such as user authentication, recipe creation and editing, and search functionality. Utilized Firebase Cloud Functions to handle server-side logic. Designed with a mobile-first approach for a seamless user experience on all devices.

projects.name: Portfolio website
projects.description: Built with React and CSS modules. Implemented custom animations and transitions for a unique and engaging user experience. Optimized for SEO and accessibility. Responsive design that looks great on all devices.

responsibilities: Develop and maintain company websites using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Collaborate with design and marketing teams to implement new features and designs.
Participate in agile development process and daily stand-up meetings.
Assisted in development of client websites using Angular and Vue.js.
Worked with senior developers to implement new features and troubleshoot issues.
Contributed to team code reviews and unit testing.
